name: Sophie (itch)
description:
It has been six months after the tragic loss of Ethan’s wife and unborn daughter. Ethan has shut himself in his rural home, neglecting the outside world and his personal well being. Play through the perspective of Ethan as he mourns the loss of Sophie and his daughter. Delve deep into their relationship and help Ethan celebrate Sophie’s life.

This game is played with a keyboard and mouse.

Optimal Screen Resolution: 1920 X 1080
